item.title: Resume
item.description: More is here https://www.agilewalker.com Interests Creating beautiful resumés from simple Markdown documents Work Experience Word Processor (Redmond, WA) Junior Resumé Maker, 2006 - 2007 Intermingled presentation and content Styling was a pain, so either didn’t do it or found a half-decent template and didn’t mess with it \LaTeX\ + pdflatex Senior Resumé Maker, 2008 - 2010 Edited verbose \LaTeX\ documents in a text editor Mixed content and presentation to achieve pixel-perfection Installed and configured the unusual TeX setups required by the best-looking \LaTeX\ resumés LinkedIn, StackOverflow Careers, vizualize.
